Content.Text:
<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How can I help
you?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Good morning. Let's both give
it our best shot today.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...You didn't see me yawning just now, did you?
See, I was burning the midnight oil last night,
and I didn't get quite enough sleep. So...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, I must be so red. Please, just go on
pretending you didn't see anything.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello there, how's it going? I was wondering,
would you have any objections if I stopped by
your farm to visit you at work?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Always look a person in the eye when you greet
them. And I know, I should take my own advice
on that.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, I'd like to see what kinds of flowers are
blooming around town...
<PAGE>
What garden has the most flowers around here?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello there, <MYNAME>. What are you up to at
this hour? Is there anything I can help you with?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is it that late already? Time flies when you're
so busy, I suppose.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. If you'll excuse me, I need to go
to bed soon. You should too, you know. Don't
stay up too late.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello there, <MYNAME>. Always good to see
you first thing in the morning.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hello there, <MYNAME>. You came to see me
first thing in the morning? ...I appreciate that.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I dreamed about you last night. ...Hmm? What
kind of dream was it, you ask?
<PAGE>
That's...a bit of a secret. Besides, explaining a
dream to someone who was already in it would
be...well, it'd be awkward.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How's your work?
<PAGE>
I wish there were something I could help you
with...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...It's strange. Just talking with you always lifts
my spirits somehow.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Busy as usual today, I see.
Don't push yourself too hard.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Have you been
working up until now? Ah, that's tough. But do
yourself a favor and rest when you get home.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I didn't think I'd be able to see you today. What a
pleasant surprise!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Are you heading
home now? I wouldn't mind taking you there,
seeing as how it's already dark.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning. You look like you had a
wonderful sleep. I love to see you rest so
peacefully.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Did you sleep well
last night?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We should both do our best today, but
remember not to push yourself too hard.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Are your morning chores finished, by chance?
I'd love to have a nice chat with you, if you've
got the time.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I wanted to talk to you. Just to
talk, not about anything in particular.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Even now that we're married, I still can't get
enough of your company. Am I too attached to
you, maybe?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
He he, you have a very distinct footfall, you
know. Nice and energetic. I can always tell when
it's you walking nearby.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I know you're busy, of course, but don't you
think it's a bit sad that we've gone this long
without talking to each other?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, if you're too busy to talk until now,
aren't you working a bit too hard?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look a little tired. Are you all right? I'll do the
housework today, so please get some rest.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, the sun is out, the weather's nice and
warm... It's so tempting just to lie down and
take a nap right now.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Rainy days make it hard to for people to come
and buy flowers. I hope this weather clears up
soon.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's so hot, I feel like I might pass out... Let's
both drink enough water to keep the heat stroke
away.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
On days like this, I use moisture-resistant
flowers to practice my arrangements. Other
flowers are too sensitive to humidity.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a beautiful day. So cool and comfy. I hope
this keeps up tomorrow.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's raining... This season gets a bit chilly around
here. We should all be careful not to catch a
cold.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
With the sun out, I feel a bit warmer than usual.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This snow is so cold. I can barely move my
fingers...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You came all the way here in a typhoon? That's
amazing...but why would you do that?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's dangerous to walk around in snow this deep.
You should go home before it gets any worse.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I know you're worried about your farm in this
typhoon, but I worry about you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So please don't push yourself too hard, and if
you go out, be careful, okay?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, with all this snow around, why not
just relax here at home?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...You and I could spend the day together. How
does that sound?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's going on, <MYNAME>? Why are you
smiling? ...Hmm? Oh, you've started seeing
someone?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Really? Well, congratulations and best wishes.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This place reminds me of this nice restaurant
back in my hometown. The people there were
always good to me.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
They keep this restaurant spotless, don't they? I
think that reflects the owner's character.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Licorice used to live in the next town over from
my hometown.
<PAGE>
We hadn't talked to each other before we came
here, though.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I talk with Klaus a lot about flowers and
fragrances. I always learn so much from him.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ooh, I do want that, but I also want that... Too
many good things here. I can't decide.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Hm? What am I doing here,
you ask?
<PAGE>
I'm looking for rare seasonal flowers. I want to
search the whole mountain, so I have to keep
coming back here every day.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm used to mountain trails, but I'm still getting
used to this place, so I'm treading carefully.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's amazing how many animals and insects and
flowers there are. I bet there're all kinds of fish in
the river, too.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place is nice and quiet. I come here for a
walk whenever I need a change of pace.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I was surprised when I first saw Giorgio's farm,
all full of flowers. Guess he likes flowers the
same way I do.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What is it about the sound of a water wheel that
makes you want to just stop, relax and listen?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now how would you go about growing those
crops there?
<PAGE>
...I guess it depends on who's using the field.
<PAGE>
I'd like to learn more about farming sometime,
but it seems like so much work...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I haven't really met Elise myself, but judging
from the condition of this paddy...
<PAGE>
She seems like a very skilled farmer. The crops
here really do grow well.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The people here are all so kind. I'm glad I moved
here.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The flowers that bloom around here look so alive
and animated.
<PAGE>
This town really has a lot of respect for nature.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you put a flower on display in a room, the
atmosphere brightens up instantly. You can try it
out anytime.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My hobby? Well, I'd say it's flower arrangement.
<PAGE>
You know what they say, right? Find a job you
love, and you'll never work a day in your life.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it comes to flower arrangement, your
senses are just as important as your know-how.
<PAGE>
Whenever I study in another town, I always
check out the flowers there. You can't tell what
they smell like just by reading a book, right?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Out of curiosity, I asked Raeger about running a
business and serving customers. He gave me a
lot of good advice.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have a dream to win this big flower
arrangement tournament someday.
<PAGE>
It's a big dream, I know, but I want to make it
happen, no matter how long it takes.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When I look at Fritz, I can't help but recall a
friend of mine back in my hometown...
<PAGE>
He's super-friendly and he always talks to me,
even if I don't talk back. Just like my friend back
home.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm not always very good at talking to people,
but for some reason, I'm much better at it with
you.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>So I'm glad we get along.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...What is it, <MYNAME>? What do you want
from me?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
These days, I don't know if we should go on
dating...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I still can't believe we're going out. I mean,
you're so popular! It's like a dream for me.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
People are happy together, and they want to
know all about us. I appreciate that, but it gets a
little embarrassing.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I feel like I fit in better than I used to around
here.
<PAGE>
Maybe because you've introduced me to so
many new people.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hm? "What do I like about you...?" Wh-why
would you ask me that all of a sudden...? Um...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>All kinds of things, but I really like the way you
make eye contact when you talk to people.
You're good at that.
<PAGE>
...Just please don't look me in the eye. I get
embarrassed when people do that.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Time always flies when we're together.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><FACE_LOVE>Of course, if I said I wanted to spend even more
time with you, that'd probably be too much to
ask.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Why did we end up like this? Where did we go
wrong?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You changed a lot after we got married. And
don't even try to say it's just me.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Am I the only one having doubts about our
relationship?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Before we got married, all I could do was cheer
you on while you worked day in and day out...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But now I can help you as your husband, even if
I can't do much more than the housework. I'm
happy for that, and I'm grateful.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You can do anything, and that means you try to
do everything...
<PAGE>
But please let me help you as much as you can.
That's part of who we are as a couple.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Ever since we started dating, I've wanted to be
with you more and more.
<PAGE>
Being married to you, spending more time with
you every day...that's a dream to me.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
With you by my side, I can work my hardest
every day.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I really want to thank you for
supporting me.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><FACE_LOVE>It's a bit embarrassing to say this, but...I love
you, <MYNAME>. And I'll always count on you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Erm, s-sorry. It's hard for me to make eye
contact with anyone, especially when...you
know.
<PAGE>
If you give me some time, I'll get used to it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We had our ups and downs, but I'm glad for all
of it. ...I'll see you around town, yeah?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You know, just talking to you like this makes me
realize... Wow, I'm your boyfriend again. You
don't know how happy that makes me.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I can't wait for the wedding ceremony. I know
you're going to look amazing in that dress.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm still getting used to living in the same house
with you. I guess this is the new normal, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I can't even imagine what it's going to be like
once we settle in together.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anytime you're not feeling well, let me know
right away. I don't want anything to happen to
you or the baby.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You want me to talk to our baby through
your tummy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>E-erm... Hi, it's your daddy. I can't wait to see
you... This is kind of silly, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Oh, did the baby just move?! Was it saying hi
back? C-can the baby hear me in there?!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our baby's due date's right around the corner,
huh? I wonder what kind of baby he's going to
be, or she. Oh, wow, this is exciting...!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our babies are so cute when they're sleeping. I
could never get tired of watching them.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> always try so hard
to crawl after me.
<PAGE>
I love the way they smile when they're catching
up, so I let them chase after me this morning.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, it's wonderful to see our kids
growing so fast, but it makes me think about
how they're going to leave the nest someday...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is...<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>? ...Can I
really have this?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R><FACE_LAUGH>This is my favorite. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is this really for me? Great! Always happy to
accept.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I like these. Thank you. I'm flattered.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can I really have this? Thank you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Erm, this is... O-oh, I see. It's a present for me...
Well, sure, I'll take it. Thank you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This is... I appreciate your thought, and I'll take
it, but please, I don't need any more of these
next time. Thank you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Ugh, <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>... I'm sorry, but I
really hate these...
<PAGE>
...Um, but here, let me take it so it doesn't go to
waste.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's twinkling. You're sure I can have it?
Thanks.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)
Let's not give him a present right now.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I appreciate your thought, but I'm afraid I can't
accept it. Please put it away.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...I'm not dating you just for the presents, you
know. Please, put that away.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Besides, your company is the best present you
could give me.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Before you give me that, is there something you
want to say...? If you don't know what I mean,
then just forget it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've already given me something today, and I
can't really carry that much. I appreciate the
thought, though.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I couldn't accept so much from you all at
once. I do appreciate the thought, though.
Thank you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You've already given me something today, and
I'd feel bad if I accepted that too. But thanks for
your thought, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Hmm? A birthday present for me? And this
is...<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>, isn't it?!
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. Best birthday ever.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, this is great! You prepared this just for my
birthday? Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so glad you put together something this nice
for my birthday. Thank you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? This is a birthday present for me? Oh, neat!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well, it's kind of a downer to get a birthday
present you don't really like, but I know you
meant well. Thanks, I'll take it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...<MYNAME>, are you unhappy with me or
something?
<PAGE>
If so, you can just tell me. Don't walk up and
give me something I hate on my birthday.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>I know birthdays are all about cakes, but
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> is my least favorite
cake, hands down.
<PAGE>
Still, I know you made it for my birthday, so
here, I'll take it. Thank you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Shiny things make great birthday presents.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder what kind of food rabbits like.
Unfortunately, I don't have any food with me
right now.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, this is cute...but you should put it back
where you found it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
An ermine, huh...? I used to see these in the
mountains around my hometown.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A sifaka. It's cute, but you should make sure to
put it back where it was.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow! I've been around, but I've never seen a
penguin before. Amazing.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The other day, Melanie told me Lutz's snacks
were stolen by a monkey... Was that you?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello! ...Hmm? My friend's parrot always says
"hello" back.
<PAGE>
I guess wild parrots aren't like the domestic kind.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You really shouldn't carry that thing around.
Please go put it back.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that fur is so fluffy. I just have to pet it. I
can't resist!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That chick might be small enough to fit in the
palm of my hand.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, that is one imposing chicken. Hard to
imagine it was just a tiny chick a little while ago.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...That dog keeps staring at me. Is there
something on my face?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that dog not getting enough exercise? Its belly
is almost touching the ground. You ought to
take it out for walks more...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know how some pets look like their
owners? I think that dog looks a little bit like
you. In a good way.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I think that dog might be a little
overfed. It's moving so slowly...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a cute cat. What is it about cats that's so
irresistible?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This cat is chubby. ...But it's a cute kind of
chubby.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Whoa, this cat's fur is tickling me...!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You're a good kitty. Listen to <MYNAME>, okay?
Yeah, good kitty.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...The extra fatness on this cat makes its paws
even softer... I can't stop touching them...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this a present for the Flower Fair? Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, it's great to get a Flower Fair present from
you. Thank you so much!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Even now that we're married, you still give me a
Flower Fair present. That's really sweet. Thank
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this a Valentine's Day present? Thank you!
This is great.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm, I'm not usually much for sweets...but
since it's coming from you on Valentine's Day,
I'll eat it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a Valentine's Day treat, right? You're
giving me one even now that we're married?
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You ought to save that blue feather for
somebody precious to you. You shouldn't just
wave it around.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I-I think it's a bit too early for us...! I mean, don't
you think we still need time?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
What? You want to marry me... What...?! L-
look, let's go somewhere else...!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don't worry. I haven't changed my mind at all. I'll
make you happy. I promise.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Please keep the feather somewhere safe. It's
what brought us together, remember?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, <MYNAME>, I hear you've been showing
our feather around. I know you don't mean
anything by it...
<PAGE>
...but I worry some people might think you're
proposing marriage. So please stop doing that.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a beautiful ring. I think it would look good
on you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You want to go out with me? You want us
to be...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...W-well, hang on! Let's go somewhere and
talk!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Every time I look at that, it reminds me that
we're sweethearts.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, that brings back memories. Without that
ring, we wouldn't be here as a couple, would
we?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, I hear you've been showing
our ring around. I know you don't mean anything
by it...
<PAGE>
...but I worry some people might think you're
asking them out. So please stop doing that.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the color of this ribbon. Did you wrap this?
